Far Realm's Gift.name: Far Realm's Gift
Far Realm's Gift.flavor: You bestow the horror of the Far Realm on your foe, transforming it into a creature of nightmare.
Far Realm's Gift.onHit: 1d12 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target assumes the form of a Far Realm horror until the end of your next turn. While in this form, the target is slowed, takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, and cannot make opportunity attacks. Any enemy that enters a square adjacent to the horror or ends its turn there takes 5 psychic damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Summon Far Realm Abomination.name: Summon Far Realm Abomination
Summon Far Realm Abomination.flavor: Your power tears the fabric of reality, summoning a tentacled horror from the Far Realm that lays waste to your foes.
Summon Far Realm Abomination.effect: You summon a Large Far Realm abomination in unoccupied squares within range. The abomination has speed 5. Any enemy not immune to fear that starts its turn within 3 squares of the abomination takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of the enemy’s next turn. You can give the abomination the following special commands.
Summon Far Realm Abomination.standardAction: Melee 2; targets a creature grabbed by the abomination; Intelligence vs. Fortitude; 5d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Summon Far Realm Abomination.instinctiveEffect: If you haven’t given the abomination any commands by the end of your turn, it makes the following attack: Close burst 3; targets each creature in the burst; Intelligence vs. Will; 1d12 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Mad Certainty.name: Mad Certainty
Mad Certainty.flavor: Your vision of the Far Realm fuels your psionic power, at a price.
Mad Certainty.effect: You regain 2 power points. Until the end of the encounter, you take a -2 penalty to all defenses.
